    <br><br>
</h1>

<p>Arsenal and Anvil is a small QoL mod aimed to add a variety of new weapons and tools for all tiers!</p>
<p>All items can be crafted like you normally would in vanilla (with the usage of a different crafting component in substitution of the stick), with a helpful guide to start you off!</p>

</h2>

<h2 align="center">How to run / build <br></h2>
<h3>Requirements</h3>
<p><b>NeoForge: </b>This mod was built on NeoForge version 21.1.173 for 1.21.1</p>
<h4>Dependencies</h4>
<ul>
<li>Apothic Attributes 2.8.1 or later</li>
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/apothic-attributes/files/6514649"><img alt="CurseForge Version" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-ApothicAttributes--1.21.1--2.8.1.jar-yellow?style=flat&logo=curseforge&color=rgb(255%2C%20208%2C%200)"></a>
<li>Placebo 9.8.1 or later</li>
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/placebo/files/6446766"><img alt="CurseForge Version" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-Placebo--1.21.1--9.8.1.jar-yellow?style=flat&logo=curseforge&color=rgb(255%2C%20208%2C%200)"></a>
<li>Curios 9.5.1 or later</li>
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/curios/files/6529130"><img alt="CurseForge Version" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-curios--neoforge--9.5.1+1.21.1.jar-yellow?style=flat&logo=curseforge&color=rgb(255%2C%20208%2C%200)"></a>
<li>Patchouli 1.21-88 or later</li>
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/patchouli/files/6164617"><img alt="CurseForge Version" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download-Patchouli--1.21--88--NEOFORGE.jar-yellow?style=flat&logo=curseforge&color=rgb(255%2C%20208%2C%200)"></a>
</ul>
<h3>Running</h3>
<p>Download the latest release <a href="https://github.com/junyali/arsenalandanvil/releases">here</a>.</p>
<h3>Building</h3>
<p>This mod was developed on IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, though may work with other Java IDEs that support the Gradle Build Tool</p>
<p>Importing from `build.gradle`, run:</p>

```console
$ ./gradlew
```
